SEARCH
Module com.exampe.dinim3akalpha001
Package com.example.dinim3akalpha001.shapes

Class ArcBuilder

java.lang.Object
com.example.dinim3akalpha001.shapes.ArcBuilder
public class ArcBuilder extends Object
Builds a Polygon or Polyline in the shape of an Arc. Based on the logic in v3_polygon_exanple_arc.html from http://econym.org.uk/gmap/ which is based in turn on the Latitude/longitude spherical geodesy formulae and scripts at http://www.movable-type.co.uk/scripts/latlong.html (c) Chris Veness 2002-2010

      public static final PolygonOptions buildClosedArc(LatLong center, LatLong start, LatLong end, javafx.scene.shape.ArcType arcType)

      Parameters:
      center -
      start -
      end -
      arcType - Pass in either ArcType.CHORD or ArcType.ROUND
      Returns:

    • buildArcPoints

      public static final MVCArray buildArcPoints(LatLong center, LatLong start, LatLong end)

    • buildArcPoints

      public static final MVCArray buildArcPoints(LatLong center, double startBearing, double endBearing, double radius)
      Generates the points for an arc based on two bearings from a centre point and a radius.
      Parameters:
      center - The LatLong point of the center.
      startBearing - North is 0 degrees, East is 90 degrees, etc.
      endBearing - North is 0 degrees, East is 90 degrees, etc.
      radius - In metres
      Returns:
      An array of LatLong points in an MVC array representing the arc. Using this method directly you will need to push the centre point onto the array in order to close it, if desired.
